404_NOT_FOUND_TEXT: We are very sorry, but we couldn't find the page you requested.
ABOUT: Let us know who you are. Short and sweet.

LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED: There was an error while logging in.
LOGIN.VIA_SOCIAL_NETWORKS: Or you can sign in via a social network.

REGISTER.VIA_SOCIAL_NETWORKS: Or you can sign up via social network.

ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_BROKEN_LINK: Ugh! The account activation link is not valid.
AD_PAUSE_ARE_YOU_SURE: Do you want to suspend this post?
AD_REMOVE_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to delete this item? No one will see it again. Never ever!
AD_REMOVE_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED: Item cannot be deleted. You better accept that and move on.
AD_REPLY_PLACEHOLDER: Are you interested? Good. Reply here...
AD_REPORT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Do you want to report this post as abuse?
AGREE_WITH_TERMS_BUTTON_LABEL: I agree with terms of use
AGREE_WITH_TERMS_POPUP: I agree with terms of use
ALREADY_USED_EMAIL: This email is being used already in our app. Yep.
AVATAR_UPLOAD_FAILED: Profile picture upload failed. What's wrong with your picture?!
AVATAR_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: New profile picture was successfully uploaded. Wow, you look good!
BUT_YOU_HAVE_INACTIVE_POSTS: But you have couple of inactive ads.
CANT_CHANGE_PASSWORD_LOGGED_IN_USING_OMN: You are logged in using external social network (e.g. Facebook, Twitter) so you can't change your Hearth.net password here.

COMMUNITY.COMMUNITY_REMOVE_ARE_YOU_SURE: Do you really want to delete this community?

CONFIRM_LEAVE.TEXT: Do you really want to leave this community?
CONFIRM_LEAVE.TITLE: Leave community

COMMUNITY.DELEGATE_ADMIN_ARE_YOU_SURE: Do you really want to hand over administration of the community?

HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_ME: You seem to be new here. Not much to show here so far. :)
HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_OTHER: This is a new community. Brand new it seems. Otherwise there would be loads of interesting and funny info here. Let's wait and see!

POSTS.NO_POSTS_ADMIN: Whaat! You haven't created any ad yet. Let's do something about it. You can give or accept, whatever comes to your beautiful mind.
POSTS.NO_POSTS_MEMBER: You have no ads in community.
POSTS.NO_POSTS_OTHER: Community hasn't offered anything yet nor needed to accept. Perhaps it is still looking around or just answering others' ads. Warming up...

COMMUNITY.REMOVE_MEMBER_ARE_YOU_SURE: Do you really want to dismiss this member from the community?
COMMUNITY.USER_ISNT_MEMBER_OF_ANY_COMMUNITY: You are not part of a community yet. You can create one yourself or check out our recommended communities. We hope at least one catches your sparkly eye.

COMMUNITY_DELETE_ANYWAY: how about handing over administration rights so the community can continue?
COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTIONS_PLACEHOLDER: Share at least 3 lines about the community...
COMMUNITY_HAS_NO_ADS_YET: Hard to believe, but this community has no ads yet. Bad imp's work?
COMMUNITY_HAS_NO_APPLICATIONS: Currently there are no applications for the community
COMMUNITY_HAS_NO_OTHER_MEMBERS_BUT_DELET: Community has no more members. How about inviting more people in?
COMMUNITY_HAS_NO_POSTS_YET: This community has no ads yet. But here you are so maybe...?
COMMUNITY_HAS_ONLY_INACTIVE_POSTS: Community has only inactive ads. You can manage them in list of all posts.
COMMUNITY_MEMBER_REMOVE_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this member from your community?
COMMUNITY_PASS_ADMIN_ONLY_WHEN_MORE_MEMB: Err, you can change community administrator only when community has more members. Invite someone along then...

TOP.KARMA_NO_RATING_ME: With your first rating, we'll bring in more colours here.
TOP.KARMA_NO_RATING_OTHER: Rate community and it will show their pretty colours :)

COMMUNITY_RATING_JOIN_REALIZED_GIFT: You can connect your rating with the ad to which you both interacted over the last 3 months.
COMMUNITY_RESTRICTIONS_PLACEHOLDER: What membership rules does the community have?
COMMUNITY_SELECT_PERSON_TO_PASS_ADMIN: Select person you want to hand over administration of community to and click send.
CREATE_COMMUNITY_AND_BE_HAPPY: After you've created a community, you`ll become its administrator. Other users may ask you for permission to join community. You can then act in a name of community, create needs and offers for its members or just for anyone.
CREATE_YOUR_NEW_NEED_AND_BE_HAPPY: Everybody has something to offer! Sometimes we all need a helping hand! Let others know you are there!
DATE_IS_EMPTY: Fill in date of ad expiration date or tick unlimited duration.
DO_YOU_KNOW_USER_TO_GIVE_HIM_POSITIVE_RA: Did you get in touch? Let the world know it was super great or maybe something didn't go as smooth...
DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_ACCOUNT: We were afraid of this. Have you made your mind up? Do you really want to delete all your traces from Hearth?
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_FAILURE: Confirmation code is invalid or has been already used. Those darn codes!
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_SUCCESS: Your email was successfully confirmed. You can now log in. Really!

EMAIL_SHARING.ADDRESS_PLACEHOLDER: Enter one or more email adresses separated by comma
EMAIL_SHARING.HEADING: Send ad to a friend
EMAIL_SHARING.NOTE: Send this ad to your friends.

ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_SIZE: The picture is too big. Reeeaaaly big.
ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_SIZE_PX_200: Your pic has a small resolution. We need minimum of 200x200 pixels.
ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_SIZE_PX_400: Your pic has a small resolution. We need 400 x 400 pixels minimum.
ERR_ACTION_FAILED_DUE_TO_ERRORS: There are errors in your ad, the action could not be finished. Please correct it and try again.
ERR_AD_NOT_FOUND: Ah! Posting wasn't found. Did it get lost or what?
ERR_AD_REPLY_NOT_AGREE: Send user your email too, so they can get in touch with you.
ERR_AD_TEXT_LEN: Your post is too long, Mr Shakespeare. We're sorry but our total length is 2500 characters.
ERR_AD_TEXT_MIN_LEN: Your post is too short. Add few more words... Wise men say that every word counts.
ERR_AD_TITLE_LEN: The post title is too looong.
ERR_AD_TITLE_MIN_LEN: Title of the post is too short.
ERR_CHOOSE_AT_LEAST_ONE_COMMUNITY: Vyberte alespoň jednu komunitu, z které se má inzerát odstranit.
ERR_COMMENT_LEN: Your comment is too long. Seriously. We're sure it's great but still too long.
ERR_COMMUNITY_ABOUT_NOT_FILLED: Please tell us a few words about the community.
ERR_COMMUNITY_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Community name is too long. Cannot exceed 75 characters. Should be enough, right?
ERR_COMMUNITY_NAME_NOT_FILLED: Please enter the name of community
ERR_COMMUNITY_NOT_FOUND: No such community here. :-( Plenty of others though.
ERR_COMMUNITY_TERMS_NOT_FILLED: Say a few words about rules of the community.
ERR_CONFIRMATION_HASH_INVALID: Error: Confirmation hash is invalid. Sounds serious but probably isn't.
ERR_EMAIL_EXISTS: This is strange but it can happen! User with this email address is already registered. Do you have a doppelganger?
ERR_FILLED_INVITE_TEXT_TOO_LONG: Input text is too long, try shorten it. Just a little...
ERR_FORM_NOT_VALID: There is an error in your form. Correct it and then save the form again.
ERR_INVITE_EMAIL_INVALID: One or more emails' format is invalid.
ERR_KEYWORD_LEN: Your keyword is too long. Remember, it's a word not a short story.
ERR_LOCATION_UNKNOWN_PLACE: We don't know such a place... Could you pick one from the list instead?
ERR_MESSAGE_TEXT_MIN_LEN: Did you remember to fill out the message?
ERR_MISSING_PWD: Please enter password. Wait! Are you alone? Go ahead!
ERR_NOT_AUTHN: Oh no! Username or password is invalid. Now, which one is it?
ERR_NOT_AUTHZ:
Hearth was not allowed to access your profile. And feels so bad now! Please try
again.
ERR_NOT_FILLED_CONTACT_EMAIL: Please fill in your contact email
ERR_NOT_FILLED_INVITE_ADDRS: Fill in emails of your friends
ERR_NOT_FILLED_INVITE_TEXT: Fill your invitaion to friends with some text
ERR_NOT_FILLED_NAME: Please fill in your name and surname
ERR_NOT_FILLED_NEW_PASS: Please fill the new password that you want to set.
ERR_NOT_FILLED_RATING: Send user some text along the rating
ERR_NOT_FILLED_SHARING_EMAIL_ADDRS: You have to fill in friend's email address
ERR_NOT_VALID_PHONE: Please use the telephone format +420 XXX XXX XXX
ERR_OLD_PASS_IS_NOT_VALID: You entered invalid current password. That Caps Lock!
ERR_PASSWORDS_DONT_MATCH: Don't freak out but your passwords don't match. Count to three now. We know you can fix it!
ERR_RATING_IS_TOO_SHORT: Add few more letters to user rating...
ERR_RATING_TEXT_LEN: Hold your horses! Your comment is too long. Maximum length is 500 characters. Still beats tweeting though.
ERR_RATING_TEXT_MIN_LEN: Your feedback is too short. Come on, you can do better!
ERR_REPLY_EMPTY_MESSAGE: Write something, the message is empty. Or do not use invisible ink.
ERR_REPLY_PLEASE_AGREE: Please confirm you agree with your e-mail being forwarded. It's just a formality.
ERR_REPORT_TEXT_MAX_LEN: Text je příliš dlouhý.. maximum je 2500 písmen.
ERR_SHARING_EMAIL_ADDRESS_INVALID: One or more adresses is not in correct format.
ERR_TOO_SHORT_NEW_PASS: New password has to have at least 5 characters! In words: five.
ERR_WRONG_IMAGE_SIZE: Oops. The file is too big. Possibly huge! Please use a file smaller than 2 MB.
ERR_WRONG_IMAGE_TYPE: Unfortunately, your image is not our type. Please use .jpg or .png file.
ERR_WRONG_LOCATION_FORMAT: Location is in invalid format. Please try it again. Or try moving someplace else.
ERR_WRONG_PASSWORD:
Password must be at least 4 characters long. 
Yep. We like maths.
FACEBOOK_INVITATION_MESSAGE: I'm at Hearth.net - generous social network for sharing gifts, skills and experience. Come give it a try!
FEEDBACK_FORM_SPEECH_BUBBLE: We're not perfect. But we can be with your help. Let us know your feedback and we'll give you better Hearth. Thank you!
FEEDBACK_TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Please let us know what works for you and what doesn't. There's always room for improvement.
FILL_CONTACT_EMAIL: Fill in your contact email for us
FILL_EMAIL_INVITATION_MESSAGE: Would you like some words going along with this email?
FILL_EMAIL_TO_RESET_PASSWORD: We just need your e-mail address. So we can send you further instructions how to reset your password.
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_EMAIL_FAIL: Bump! A confirmation email sending failed. Did you have your fingers crossed?
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_EMAIL_SUCCESS: Confirmation email was sent to your email address. To create new password, just open it and show us your clicking skills.
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_TEXT: To obtain a new password, please enter your email address and we will send you a link full of secret magic.
FULLTEXT_NOTHING_FOUND: Dang! We did not find anything.
FULLTEXT_NOTHING_FOUND_RELATED_TO:
Dang! Nothing close to {{value}} found.
It is either hiding very well somewhere or simply non existent here yet.
FULLTEXT_WE_FOUND_RESULTS: Yes! We found results for you concerning {{value}}
INFO_BOX_LOADING_ERROR: There was an error while loading
INVITATION_SENDING_SUCCESS: Yes! An email has been sent.
LOCATIONS_ARE_EMPTY: Fill in location or tick box no location needed.
LOCATIONS_IS_EMPTY: Fill in the location or tick place doesn't matter.
LOGIN_BAD_CREDENTIALS: Login and password do not match. Please try again.
LOGIN_INACTIVE_ACCOUNT: Pokoušíte se přihlásit pomocí účtu, který ještě nebyl aktivován kliknutím na odkaz v e-mailu s potvrzením registrace. E-mail s aktivačním odkazem si můžete
LOGIN_REQUIRED: You have to be signed in to do this.
LOG_IN_BEFORE_REPORT: Please log in first to report the ad.
LOG_IN_TO_CREATE_COMMUNITY: You must be logged in to create a community
LOG_IN_TO_POST_NEW_WISHES: Please, log in to post new wishes.

ADD.HEADING: New message
ADD.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Fill the message you want to send to the selected recipients ...

ARCHIVE_CONFIRM.LABEL: Archive this conversation?
ARCHIVE_CONFIRM.TEXT: If you archive the conversation whenever you can return to it in Archive. And you will not miss a new message in it, we will notify you about it...

DELETE_CONFIRM.LABEL: Delete this conversation?
DELETE_CONFIRM.TEXT: If you delete this conversation, you will not be able to return to it. Other recipients will have access to it.

DETAIL.CONVERSATION_IS_EMPTY: all users have left the conversation

LEAVE_CONFIRM.LABEL: Leave this conversation?
LEAVE_CONFIRM.TEXT: If you leave the conversation, the other recipients will continue the conversation, but you will not be able to access to it. We will move the conversation to Archive where you can return to its history.

MESSAGES.NEW_MESSAGE_SENT: You have successfully sent a message!
MESSAGES.NEW_MESSAGE_USER_RESTRICTION: Zde můžete vybrat pouze ty uživatele, se kterými již máte nějakou vazbu. Pokud chcete napsat jinému uživateli, udělejte to z jeho profilu.
MESSAGES.NO_MESSAGE_YET: Ještě jsi nikomu nic nenapsal člověče a nikdo ani neposla žádnou zprávu tobě. Můžeš to hned změnit:

MY_CONTACT_EMAIL_EXAMPLE: This is the address for other Hearth users to contact you.
MY_INTERESTS: What rocks your boat? Interests, hobbies? C'mon, we all have one!
MY_INTERESTS_EXAMPLE: Fill in keywords separated by commas e.g. teaching, society, Black Metal...
MY_TELL_ABOUT: Tell us few things about you. Yeah you, the great you!
MY_TELL_ABOUT_EXAMPLE: Few humble shiny words about yourself, your values and beliefs, pet peeves even...
NAME: First name and surname
NEGATIVE_FEEDBACK_PLACEHOLDER: That wasn't... exactly great. But it can be the next time! Just tell the user what to improve.
NEW_COMMUNITY_CREATED_TEXT: Now you can switch to administrator view. You will act as a whole community.
NEW_VERSION_NOTIFICATION: Máme pro vás připravenou novější verzi Hearth. Chcete Hearth aktualizovat teď nebo to necháte na později?
NOTHING_FOUND: Too bad! We haven't found anything. Maybe if you try again and ask differently?

NOTIFICATION.ALERT_EXPIRING_POSTS: Send notifications for ads close to their expiration date (usually 3 days before expiry).

NOTIFICATION.ALERT_NEW_MESSAGES_IN_CONVERSATION: Send notifications of new messages in the conversation.
NOTIFICATION.ALERT_TIME_UNLIMITED_POSTS: Send notifications for ads without expiration date.
NOTIFICATION.MESSAGES_ALLOW_ONLY_POST_REPLIES: I don't want to receive messages that aren't replies to my gifts and wishes.

OK_ACCOUNT_CREATED: Yippee! Your Hearth account has been created.
OK_CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL_AND_CONFIG: We just sent an activation mail to your email address. Just click the link inside and dive into the world of Hearth.net.  We're excited! Are you?

PASSWORD_NOT_FILLED: Enter new password you want to set

POST.TYPE_CHANGE_IS_DISABLED: Na inzerát již někdo odpověděl, a proto již nelze změnit typ.

COMMUNITTIES.NO_COMMUNITTIES_ME: You are not part of any community yet, dear lone wolf. But you can create a community yourself or check out our recommended communities. You never know what awaits there.
COMMUNITTIES.NO_COMMUNITTIES_OTHER: User is not a member of any community here.

FOLLOWEES.NO_FOLLOWEES_ME: You do not follow anyone. How come? Quick, get to someone's profile and select Follow...
FOLLOWEES.NO_FOLLOWEES_OTHER: User is not following anyone here. You can follow him and maybe he reciprocates. Rules of attraction in following...

FOLLOWERS.NO_FOLLOWERS_ME: No one follows you yet. Their loss. But you can follow whomever you like starting right now...
FOLLOWERS.NO_FOLLOWERS_OTHER: User doesn't have any followers here. You can be their first. Yo!

FRIENDS.NO_FRIENDS_ME: You seem to be sans friends here. Follow anyone following you and voilà, we have a friendship right there!
FRIENDS.NO_FRIENDS_OTHER: User doesn't have any friends here. Now what? Follow each other and you become friends. Easy peasy.

HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_ME: You're new here. Not much to show for your activity :)
HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_ME_OLDER: You have no activity here so far.
HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_OTHER: User is new here. Not lazy but new so we cannot show you his activity.
HOME.NO_ACTIVITY_OTHER_OLDER: User has no activity here yet. Sluggard...
HOME.NO_POSTS_ME: You haven't created any ad. Let's do something about it, shall we. You can give or accept anything that comes to your beautiful mind.

POSTS.NO_GIVEN_RATINGS_ME: It seems you haven't given nor accepted anything. That's why you could not share with us how did it all go. But you can fix that easily!
POSTS.NO_GIVEN_RATINGS_OTHER: User has not given nor accepted anything. That's why he couldn't give a rating to anyone.
POSTS.NO_POSTS_ME: Beware! You haven't created any ad so far. Let's set it right. You can give or accept anything that comes to your mind.
POSTS.NO_POSTS_OTHER: User hasn't given nor accepted anything. Maybe they are looking around or simply answering others' ads.
POSTS.NO_RECEIVED_RATINGS_ME: You haven't been bold enough to reply to an ad yet. So nobody had the chance to post a couple of nice words in exchange here...

TOP.KARMA_NO_RATING_ME: With your first rating, we'll bring in more colours here.
TOP.KARMA_NO_RATING_OTHER: Rate user and he will show their pretty colours :)

PROFILE.YOUR_PROFILE_IS_EMPTY: Your profile seems to be kind of sad... Hey, it's empty. Don't play a secret agent and tell the world about stuff you like.

PROFILE_WAS_UPDATED: Your profile was updated. You are  like a whole new person now!

SHARING_SOCIAL_DISABLED: Sharing on other social networks is not allowed
SHARING_SOCIAL_ENABLED: Others may share the post on various social networks
SIGNUP_ERR_BAD_EMAIL_FORMAT: Email doesn't have a valid format
SIGNUP_ERR_BAD_NAME: This name cannot be used. Just can't.
SIGNUP_ERR_EASY_PASSWORD: This password is too simple. You can do better!
SIGNUP_ERR_SHORT_PASSWORD: This password is too short, it has to consist of at least 5 characters.
SIGNUP_HEADING_TEXT: Your profile is just few baby steps away. Quick, quick!
SIGNUP_PROCESS_ERROR: Ugh. Something is broken. Registration could not be finished.
SIGNUP_WAS_SUCCESSFUL:
Thank you for registering, you're almost with us!

We sent message with activation link to your e-mail, clicking the link will activate your account. This is to confirm your e-mail, so no one can say they are you, you know.

Please wait a moment before the e-mail gets through. Meanwhile feel free to check out our Market to see what posts await you.
TELL_ME_WHAT_ARE_YOU_LOOKING_FOR: Tell me what are you looking for...
TERMS_OF_USE_ON_HEARTH: Terms and conditions of the generous social network - Hearth.net
THANKS_FOR_REPORT: Thanks for the notice, we will check this post.
THIS_IS_BOB:
Are you new here? Get inspired by {{users}} people here.
See, there's nothing to it! Just say THANKS.
TUTORIAL_DONT_SHOW_ANYTHING: Don't show me a thing. I will be like Sherlock, discovering all by myself.
TUTORIAL_HEADER: Hearth.net has a brand new suit. We'll show you cool stuff hidden in its pockets.
TYPE_IN_WHAT_YOU_SEARCH_FOR: Looking for something or someone? We can help!
UNKNOWN_EMAIL: We do not recognize this email and have never seen it. And you?
USER_HAS_BEEN_DELETED: Your account has been removed. Completely.
USER_HAS_NOT_BEEN_RATED: User has not been rated by others yet
USER_HAS_NO_RATINGS_YET: User has no ratings here by now.
USER_HAS_NO_WISHES: User has no wishes so far.
USER_RATING_JOIN_REALIZED_GIFT: You can accompany your rating with ad, to which you have both interacted over the past 3 months.
WE_ARE_SORRY_THAT_YOU_WANT_TO_LEAVE: So sad you are leaving us. But never say never, right. Please tell us why and we will work harder on getting you back on board:
WE_HAVE_SENT_YOU_AN_EMAIL_TO_RESET_PASSW: Hurray! We just sent you a secret confirmation code. You'll find it in e-mail.
WE_WILL_MISS_YOU__TELL_US_WHY_YOU_LEAVE: Sad to see you go. We will miss you. Please, let us know why are you leaving or how can we make Hearth.net better. We'll try to do just that, you'll see.
WHAT_YOU_NEED_OR_OFFER_PLACEHOLDER: Tell the world, what can you give or accept:
WRITE_COMMUNITY_SOME_RATING: Add couple of words to the community rating
WRITE_INVITATION_BY_EMAIL_TO_YOUR_FRIEND: Include a message to your friends invite.
WRITE_USER_SOME_RATING: Add couple of words to user's rating...
YOU_ARE_OFFLINE: It seems that there is a problem with your internet connection...
YOU_CAN_CONTACT_USER: Do you want to contact this user? Send him / her an e-mail to {{email}}.
YOU_HAVE_ALREADY_REPLIED_TO_THIS_POST: You have replied to this post.
YOU_HAVE_NOT_BEEN_RATED: You have not been rated by others yet
YOU_HAVE_NO_ACTIVE_POSTS_YET: You have no ads yet. You can add them though
YOU_HAVE_NO_RATINGS_YET: You have no ratings here. You scared or what? :)
YOU_HAVE_NO_WISHES: You have no wishes so far.
YOU_HAVE_ONLY_INACTIVE_POSTS: You only have inactive ads here. You can enable them in the list of all posts.
